attributes.action: Support the Prime Minister’s deal to leave the EU. Tell parliament to pass it.
attributes.additional_details: This petition is here so it can be an Indicative Vote to guide MPs on the public's mood on the various Brexit options
attributes.background:
“You, the public, have had enough…You want this stage of the Brexit process to be over and done with. I agree. I am on your side.
I passionately hope MPs will find a way to back the deal I've negotiated with the EU…that delivers on the result of the referendum and is the very best deal negotiable.”
